lore: The Council of Rodia, concerned about the sudden appearance of these creatures, is trying to find a way to keep them away from cities.\n\nWisps can move through inorganic matter, and they use this skill to remain hidden and undetected. The Laughing Wisp particularly enjoys making use of this ability, especially at night, in old mansions where few people live. There it loves to laugh out loud, while moving from wall to wall or entering decorative objects to terrorize the residents and occasionally provoke a heart attack.
menagerieDialog: (It's oddly difficult for your eyes to adjust to the appearance of this creature. Just as you try to focus on its body, it blurs and slips away from your sight. Probably a trick of the light.)
(You can't help but appreciate the fact that this creature plays so many tricks on Everett.)
(Whenever it laughs, it sounds as if an entire audience of people is giggling all at once.)
(This creature constantly cycles between a cacophony of crying and laughter.)
(It's pulsing nervously. Perhaps one of your other creatures did something to upset it.)
name: Laughing Wisp
